attributes.action: apply ONE percentage rate of income tax irrespective of actual income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why do the laws of mathematics not apply to income tax?

10% of 100 = 10
10% of 1000 = 100

The above is fair. You earn ten times as much and you pay ten times as much in taxes. Under the current system, this is NOT the case. Depending on the actual numbers, you can end up paying MORE than ten times as much in taxes.
